div.p: To the Linnean Society of London
Linnean Society, London, Certificates of Fellows, Foreign Members and Associates, 1891-97.
We, the Undersigned, beg to recommend

L[uke]
M initially wrote ‘L. Rodway’ but then extended the initial to a name in a way that left this unclear but looking rather like ‘Luke’ as it was read at the Linnean Society. In fact, Rodway’s name was Leonard.
Rodway Esqr.
Line underlined in crayon.
of Hobart. Tasmania, for the fellowship of the Linnéan Society, which honor he can fairly aspire to through his microscopic investigation of many plants in the Tasm. flora.
